game.name: DCS: Combined Arms Frontlines Georgia Campaign
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Downloadable Content, Captions available, VR Support, Partial Controller Support, Includes level editor
game.shortDescription: The Combined Arms: Frontlines Georgia campaign is the first all Combined Arms single player campaign. In this campaign you will experience many different aspects of Combined Arms combat in DCS World, from commanding a large number of units over a number of different objectives to sitting in a tank a
